Module edu.ntnu.k2g3.idatt1002.Controllers
Package edu.ntnu.k2g3.idatt1002

Class Tournament

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.k2g3.idatt1002.Tournament
public class Tournament extends Object
Represents a Tournament.
Author:
jenscl, annamarieboetvedt, williamlie

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Tournament(String name)
    Constructor for instantiating a new tournament A Tournament has a name, a list of the teams playing and a list of the matches in the tournament It can be either a singles tournament or a doubles tournament

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAll(ArrayList<Team> teamsToAdd)
    Method for adding a list of teams to the tournament's list of teams
    void
    addTeam(Team team)
    Method for adding a team to the list of teams playing in the tournament
    void
    createNewMatches()
    Method used for creating new matches for the tournament If there are no matches in the list of matches, the list of teams is shuffled and createMatches method is called using the list of teams as the input If the tournament has progressed, it creates new matches based on the winners from the previous matches
    ArrayList<Match>
    getMatches()
    Method for getting the list of matches in the tournament
    String
    getName()
    Method for getting the name of a tournament
    ArrayList<Team>
    getTeams()
    Method for getting the list of teams in the tournament
    boolean
    isDoubles()
    Method for checking if the tournament is singles or doubles
    void
    setDoubles(boolean doubles)
    Method for setting the tournament to either being a doubles or a singles tournament

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Tournament

      public Tournament(String name)
      Constructor for instantiating a new tournament A Tournament has a name, a list of the teams playing and a list of the matches in the tournament It can be either a singles tournament or a doubles tournament
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the tournament

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Method for getting the name of a tournament
      Returns:
      The name of the tournament

    • isDoubles

      public boolean isDoubles()
      Method for checking if the tournament is singles or doubles
      Returns:
      True if the tournament is a doubles tournament, false if it is a singles tournament

    • setDoubles

      public void setDoubles(boolean doubles)
      Method for setting the tournament to either being a doubles or a singles tournament
      Parameters:
      doubles - A boolean being true/false depending on the type of the tournament

    • addTeam

      public void addTeam(Team team)
      Method for adding a team to the list of teams playing in the tournament
      Parameters:
      team - The team to be added

    • getTeams

      public ArrayList<Team> getTeams()
      Method for getting the list of teams in the tournament
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of the teams playing in the tournament

    • getMatches

      public ArrayList<Match> getMatches()
      Method for getting the list of matches in the tournament
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of the matches in the tournament

    • addAll

      public void addAll(ArrayList<Team> teamsToAdd)
      Method for adding a list of teams to the tournament's list of teams
      Parameters:
      teamsToAdd - The list of teams to be added

    • createNewMatches

      public void createNewMatches()
      Method used for creating new matches for the tournament If there are no matches in the list of matches, the list of teams is shuffled and createMatches method is called using the list of teams as the input If the tournament has progressed, it creates new matches based on the winners from the previous matches
